SELECT a.id,a.recType,a.flowNo,a.amount,a.status,a.recTime,a.actTime,a.update_uid,a.bborderid, b.text,c.account,c.customername,d.text AS bankname,c.cardnumber,c.mobile,c.status AS cardStatus, e.username AS exeUser, CASE a.recType WHEN 'A01' THEN '充值' ELSE '转账' END AS recTypes, CASE a.status WHEN 1 THEN '已到账' WHEN 2 then '未到账' ELSE '未到账' END as statusName, a.remark as remark FROM user_recharge_detail a LEFT JOIN sys_code_table b ON a.recType=b.typeCode LEFT JOIN user_card_info c ON a.user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_code_table d ON c.bank = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_user e ON a.update_uid = e.id
order by a.recTime desc

SELECT a.id,a.drawTime,a.amount,a.counts,a.flowNo,a.lastUpdateTime,a.status, b.account,b.customername,c.text as bankname,b.cardnumber,b.mobile,d.username AS exeUser, CASE a.statuss WHEN 0 THEN '申请' ELSE '已处理' END AS description, a.remark as remark FROM user_withdraw_detail a LEFT JOIN user_card_info b ON a.user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN sys_code_table c ON b.bank = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_user d ON a.update_uid = d.id
order by a.drawTime desc
